item.description:
Keith and Donna are opening up their home in Haverhill for another afternoon of game playing.

Things to bring: Keith and Donna have a great collection of games, but you are welcome to bring any you may like to play. There will be snacks and drinks, but anyone is welcome to bring their own favorites.

Specific details: There are two cats and a dog. The cats will be kept in a bedroom, but be aware there is a friendly dog wandering the house.

Parking is available anywhere on the street.

Those who RSVP "yes" will get an e-mail that week with the specific address and directions.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Games in Haverhill
